description: Main entry point and app initialization for a Flutter attendance tracking app, including widget setup, provider configuration, startup timing logic, and navigation.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget managing theme and global providers, and displaying splash or main app content.

classes.name: _MyAppState
classes.description: State class for MyApp handling startup timers, post-frame initialization, and build logic.

classes.name: _AppContent
classes.description: Widget displaying main app content or startup banner based on initialization timeout.

classes.name: _InstantSplash
classes.description: Lightweight placeholder widget shown during startup.

classes.name: RootSwitcher
classes.description: Widget switching between login screen and home shell based on authentication status.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: Main shell with bottom navigation for attendance and reports screens.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: State for HomeShell managing tab index and user interactions.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes environment and runs the app.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes startup timeout watchdog and post-frame callback.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree with providers and app content.
